What it is: Identifies which archetypes are currently active within your psyche.
How to use it: Describe current moods and actions. Ask AI to assign symbolic archetypes and show their influence.
What it changes: Provides a mythic map of internal forces to inform alignment or redirection.

What it is: Creates a mythic act that extracts guilt and transfers it into symbolic form.
How to use it: Describe guilt source. Ask AI to externalize it as an object, burnable or transformable.
What it changes: Releases emotional burden while retaining symbolic accountability.

What it is: Charts emotional scars across symbolic space like a mythic constellation.
How to use it: List wounds. Ask AI to turn them into stars, connect them into a sacred meaning pattern.
What it changes: Renders pain as part of a coherent symbolic cosmos.

What it is: Creates an eternal archetype who has seen everything you've endured.
How to use it: Describe your hidden suffering. Ask AI to summon a symbolic witness.
What it changes: Installs emotional validation and removes the burden of invisibility.

What it is: Puts your darkest self on mythic trial to learn from its testimony.
How to use it: Describe your shadow. Ask AI to hold a symbolic courtroom drama.
What it changes: Extracts purpose and intelligence from your destructive instincts.

What it is: Constructs a symbolic simulation of a difficult relationship or argument.
How to use it: Describe the other person and issue. Ask AI to simulate mythic interaction outcomes.
What it changes: Enables pattern detection and emotional rehearsal in symbolic safety.

What it is: Builds a symbolic sentence that grounds you during dissociation or panic.
How to use it: Describe what destabilizes you. Ask AI to return a sacred sentence.
What it changes: Provides tethering language during psychological fragmentation.

What it is: Uses symbolic logic to reveal what you habitually overlook.
How to use it: Describe your goal. Ask AI what internal force sabotages your awareness.
What it changes: Unmasks hidden resistance and blocked clarity.

What it is: Builds a symbolic altar where your anger is honored, then transmuted.
How to use it: Name the grudge. Ask AI to construct the altar and guide the symbolic release.

What it is: Creates a symbolic dice set for decision-making that incorporates fate and archetype.
How to use it: Describe your decision. Ask AI to define 6 symbolic outcomes and roll mythically.
What it changes: Builds trust in subconscious preference and cosmic narrative logic.
